description: Exponential horn validated against Webster horn equation analytical solution
physics: Webster equation for exponential horn: p(x) = exp(-m*x) * [A*exp(-j*k_e*x) + B*exp(j*k_e*x)] where k_e = sqrt(k^2 - m^2)

geometry.notes: Rasetshwane & Neely (JASA 2012, PMC3316681) axisymmetric exponential horn

expected.behavior: High-pass: SPL higher above cutoff than below. Exponential decay below cutoff.
expected.notes: Webster is 1D approximation of 3D. Cutoff fc = alpha*c0/(2*pi) where alpha = m/L.

source: Analytical solution of Webster horn equation for exponential profile; geometry from Rasetshwane & Neely, JASA 2012
